title: Iran’s Ballistic Missile Launchers Have Been Cut by Half, Israeli Official Says
summary_full: The Israeli military says it identified a significant recent acceleration in Iran’s efforts to rebuild its missile production capabilities.
summary_public: The Israeli military says it identified a significant recent acceleration in Iran’s efforts to rebuild its missile production capabilities.
